name: Mojito Woody's Rescue
description: MOJITO Woody's Rescue puts you on a journey to find your best dog friend Woody, who has been kidnapped by an evil Cucumber, in a cute 3d adventure with sandbox levels, platforming challenges and exploration zones. Inspired by Super Mario 64 - Odyssey / Banjo Kazooie / Celeste

name: Cyberbugs
description: Cyberbugs is a post apocalyptic twin stick shooter which takes place long after humanity has gone extinct. Insectoids has gained consciousness through the means of cybernetics by previous human experiments and are now having the time of their life. Enter the arena and fight your way out.

name: Great Lakes Simulator
description: Great Lakes Simulator... Drive 1-to-1 Scale Lake Freighters On The World Famous Great Lakes!

name: Armchair Racer
description: Race against your friends or AI in this top down arcade racer!

name: Quick Shot
description: Destroy the robots before they kill you!

name: Abeyance
description: Abeyance is a roguelite, sci-fi, dungeon-crawler. Salvage wrecked starships in a gritty, post-apocalyptic world. Fight mutants and mechanized defense systems. Battle your inner demons to save your soulâ€¦ and reclaim your humanity.

name: Lazy Girl
description: Action-platformer with puzzles for the most hardcore gamers! Help the young wizard to save her loved one. Use your reaction, intelligence, and some gravity-changing magic to complete ten dungeons and fight the evil technomage.

name: Alcheverse: Shadow from Gladview
description: Alcheverse: Shadow from Gladview is an unique mix of AutoBattler & Crafting games. Explore an ever-changing map, gather strange ingredients and mix them together to craft Alcheverse: powerful creatures born from alchemy! Let them fight for you in strategic automatic battles and save Gladview!

name: Happy Bones Infernal
description: Upon arriving at a correctional facility located in a remote mountainous region, a young man named Roan quickly finds his surroundings are falling into disarray in this Horror-Themed JRPG!

name: Galactic Chef
description: A sci-fi cooking competition show game with procedurally-generated ingredients and voxel-based cooking simulation - Beat the clock and your opponents through a full season of culinary challenges to win the Galactic Chef title and unlock new game modes and other content!

name: Lemon vs. Teddy
description: Become a lemon and destroy the world with sausages before Teddy does it in this combat-focused RPG.

name: The Piano That Stops Time
description: The Piano That Stops Time is an emotional visual novel about a boy and a girl who play the piano.

name: After Shadows
description: After Shadows is a metroidvania with roguelike elements. Get into a distant post-apocalyptic future, where all of humanity became extinct. Explore the abandoned Fortress, look for traps and hide from Dark Monster who is chasing you.

name: Neon Souls
description: Neon Souls is a Fast-paced Splatformer where you Paint Invisible Platforms with Neon Ink. Everything you do(Walk, Jump, Double Jump, Slide by the Walls) Spray Neon Ink in the Platforms, the game have a lot of Levels and Bosses to be beaten for you Soft and Small Hands.

name: Crystarise
description: Explore a vast field, create your own sky island, the island gives the girl the power. An open world-action RPG that rises with a mysterious sky island.

name: Agent Stilus
description: Agent Stilus is a 2D side-scrolling platformer shooter. Omega Corp creates implants and chips for implantation into people.

name: Mistral
description: Mistral is a 3D action roguelike game where you journey through a fantasy world. Collect relics to boost your powers, and use your weapons & spells to defeat the force of evil.

name: Impower
description: Impower is a rogue-lite spellcasting platformer. Create powerful spells to defeat any foe.

name: Raiders of the Icepeak Mountains
description: Battle orc clans and survive deadly dungeons while leveling up as an adventurer. Will you become a fighter, wizard, cleric or rogue?

name: Sin Bearers Tactics
description: Follow the Sin Bearers' adventures, a mercenary group evolving in a fictive near future on Earth, through the 24 maps of this old school tactical game.

name: Ages of Cataria
description: Care for generations of townsfolk in a land of mystique and wonder. Build colonies along side your friends in this multiplayer colony sim and narrative RPG.

name: Aluminium
description: A virtual reality shooting range with randomly generated targets, obstacles, and a countdown timer.

name: Hack and Slime
description: What could be scarier than a massive dungeon-tower infested with skulls, ogres, and dragons? That those same monsters ride the largest multinational in the world with it. You know; business is business.

name: The Mighty Quest
description: When evil is growing, itâ€™s time to stand your ground and do your Mighty Quest. Fight your way through the hordes of enemies and tricky bosses in the 2D RPG with the elements of platformer

name: DarkHouse
description: This is not a typical corridor horror, but a game in a semi-open world with horror elements. You will have to perform a reverse ritual in a psychiatric clinic in order to banish the creepy Doctor back to Hell! Not for weaklings!!! Especially in the Nightmare mode, a real hardcore awaits you!

name: Long Tail
description: Long Tail is a combination of classic snake game with puzzle game based on route planning. Find the best way to collect all coins scattered on the board. Bounce from your own tail, avoid spikes, use portals... No time pressure or failure punishments - anytime you can undo any move!

name: Pizza Man
description: Race against time to deliver your pizzas.

name: Welcome to Empyreum
description: Welcome to Empyreum is a local co-op party game up to 4 players. The main goal is to organize and clean numerous floors of the hotel with mechanics involving everyday chores (vacuuming or making the bed), and crazy tasks like taking care of alien babies and chasing ghosts away!

name: OtherSoul
description: In this horror game, you must do everything you can to escape the demonâ€™s clutches alive. Your soul is at stake. You will be saved or you will be damned forever. Remember, in the game, your choices can affect the people most important to you. Protect them and your mental state! Fight to the end!

name: NecroBouncer
description: Rogue-like dungeon crawler where you have a chance to play as a necromancer, who works as a bouncer in a dungeon club. Choose your path, try out endless builds, and go on to defeat hardcore bosses to acquire and unleash their powers on hordes of enemies!

name: Pity Please!
description: Pity Please! is a homeless mastery game about survival, strategy, exploration, and capitalizing on societal systems while adapting to the vagrant lifestyle! A grid-based, casual survival strategy game with a cartoony 2.5D isometric aesthetic.

name: Twinland
description: Twinland is a Metroidvania set in a kingdom full of weird creatures, dangerous dungeons and powerful artifacts. Explore varied locations, fight numerous bosses â€“ and be on lookout for secrets 'cause they are everywhere!

name: Psycho Bathroom
description:
Psycho Bathroom is a 2D boss rush game. In the bathroom you reside in, your toilet lid is broken. Every toilet flush is splashing aerosols all over the place. You, as a toothbrush, must eradicate the threat and protect your master.
Upgrade your gear! Meet new buddies! Bond with your master and explore his dark but comic story.

name: Cleared Hot
description: CLEARED HOT is a nostalgic helicopter shooter with satisfying physics and light tactical elements. Shoot, dodge, move your squad around the battlefield, and pick up almost anything with your rope and magnet.

name: Dream Loop
description: The ambient indie adventure. An atmospheric first person lucid dreamscape by The Mad Men of Oopsy Daisy, Inc. "...a deeply emotional audio experience, with an innovative and immersive 'music looping' puzzle system."

name: He Will Shoot
description: He Will Shoot - is a simple zombie killer from the third person in a variety of scenery. Choose from four arenas: a Post-Apocalyptic City, a Slum, an Industrial Zone or the Northern Mountains. Use different types of weapons to clear this place from hordes of bloodthirsty zombies.

name: The Glitch Fairy
description: The Glitch Fairy is an action packed 2d side scroller starring Monie, an eccentric fairy with the unusual power to ''glitch'' her enemies. Each enemy glitches differently, so our little fairy needs to use her ability wisely to reach different places, discover hidden paths, speedrun, and more!

name: The Wrath of the Erlik
description: The Wrath Of The Erlik is a 3d fantasy rpg game based on turkish mythology.

name: EbonSide
description: EbonSide is a JRPG with mmo aspects! What does that mean? Well! You can explore the open world of Mest Jest! Get lost in the story about the false Dark champion trying to corrupt the world with a shard of Ebonside! A sword forged by the God of Darkness!

name: Hammer of Virtue
description: A melee action game with fully destructible levels. Use your hammer for deliberate combat or just smash the environment and hammer the chunks towards your enemies. Interactive environments that creates emergent gameplay and general chaos.

name: Reborn Tribe
description: Reborn Tribe is a medieval style simulation INDIE GAME developed by one person. In this game, players build houses and hire staffs to run the farms, pastures, etc. You have to encounter a lot difficulties and find out the reason why your tribe disappeared.

name: Blood Bay
description: Blood Bay is a 4-player open-world survival RPG. In a Fabulous Fantasy setting.Which is set on magical islands. Each island is fraught with secrets that you have to reveal!

name: Cards of Patience
description: Cards of Patience combines solitaire-like gameplay with RPG and roguelite elements. Choose your hero and fight against a variety of enemies by destroying all their cards. Use different levelable spells and equip yourself with powerful items and potions.

name: Epic Tower for Tireless Lovers
description: Embody an almost fairytale like princess. Housed at the top of a tower she faces an abundant amount of suitors who show up to win her over. Take the control of the princess, create your own tower, place traps and send suitors packing in this colorful and offbeat universe!

name: Tiranogg
description: Help a badass female mercenary and her frail male priest reclaim her throne as the rightful heir of Sangreal!

name: Peak Darkness
description: Survive and defend your home or don't it really doesn't matter. What matters is sending those things back to where they came from. Use weapon upgrades, friends or whatever to do this just get it done.

name: Blockgeon
description: Pick your team with 3 adventurers, explore and clean the dungeon! Cast your skill based on Color Matching to destroy incoming blocks with every round and try to damage the dungeonâ€™s boss when you can. Colour and pattern matching dungeon adventure await you!

name: Stars Arisen
description: Will you rise to the heavens when you wield the magic of fallen stars? Call lightning, ride the wind, and raise the dead in this fantasy epic!

name: Space Doomer
description: "Space Doomer" is a 2D arcade game. The main goal of which is to kill all the enemies on the field and get points.

name: Levenium
description: Levenium, a sci-fi action adventure. Fight, think, craft, hack and puzzle your way to freedom.

name: SnowTunes Island
description: SnowTunes Island is a musical platforming adventure where the soundtrack doubles as your life-bar. As a Snowman, use momentum and ice to cross the island and catch the thief who stole your CD collection!

name: Mythic
description: Mythic is a Roguelite MMO where you explore an infinite, procedurally generated labyrinth. Discover a world packed with puzzles, enemies, bosses, and treasure. Join forces with fellow heroes to hunt down the gods, or strike out alone and be the first to discover uncharted territory. Become Mythic.

name: Slide Stories: Bucky's Quest
description: Follow Bucky, a brave and faithful dog, and his friend Shin on a journey through a mysterious dungeon in this relaxing and minimalist slide puzzle game.

name: Eniko: Ghosts of Grace
description: A story-rich action rpg that pays hommage to 90's gaming with it's retro 2.5D pixel art look. Join Livia, a gusty but ambitious young Warrior, in a tale that explores the meaning of family, loyalty, ambition and war. After a fateful encounter, everything Livia believes in will be put to the test.

name: Deep Fog
description: "Deep Fog" is a single-player 2D horizontal pixel horror adventure game. Explore the strange events that occurred in the fog city, 5 chapters will be phased release.

name: LuPR: Lunar Post Recruit
description:
A retro first-person shooter party game where 1-4 local players battle with or against AI bots as soldiers in the Planetary Faction war. Choose from 4 different arena-style game modes. Throw grenades, shoot black holes, set explosive traps, snipe and have a party as your faction fights for victory!

Defeat the content unlock challenges or configure custom games with your favorite arena game modes, maps, weapons and player setup.

name: Dungeon Lad
description: Explore a randomly generated dungeon as you juggle your health, gold, and remaining time. Complete floors and defeat enemies in order to unlock more powerful upgrades for subsequent runs to delve deeper and deeper. Unlock more upgrades, skins, enemies and more as you explore infinite dungeons.

name: The Shattered Elements Arena
description: The Shattered Elements Arena is a controller based top-down 2D physics action game for 1-4 players. Test if your squad of mages can maneuver through four zones of dangerous encounters with the Jurisdiction inside an Arena the Wise Witch has deviously devised in order to train the Defiance.

name: City Air Battle
description: City Air Battle is an arcade style flight racing and shooting game. In the game, you can not only fly all kinds of stunts between skyscrapers, but also compete and fight fiercely with your opponents, and constantly challenge your flight and shooting skills in fast-paced and high-intensity confrontation.

name: Timber Story
description: A Tree has fallen and blocked the main road, luckily enough there is a kind lumberjack that could clear the fallen tree for a small favor. Go on a mission to find and rescue the lumberjacks best friend who has gone missing deep in the woods.

name: Plague Infection
description: Plague Infection is a Bomberman game, at its best. Lay out the flasks with explosives, and clear your way. You need to collect all the vaccines while there is still time to defeat the disease. But be careful there are zombies everywhere.

name: Find the Cat
description: Find the Cat is an upcoming relaxing exploration first person game and artistic experience in which you have to find and collect colored cats.

name: Flat Eye
description: Flat Eye is a resource management sim with an emphasis on story and narrative choices. Oversee the worldâ€™s leading technological hub while you explore stories linked to discoverable technology and interact with your most loyal customers. Flat Eye - We're watching.

name: Popped Up
description: This is like a Pac-Man game on steroids, but as a platformer. Collect all the caps without dying and keep increasing your score. This is a challenging, skill based game. If you're good at this game, then you probably have the perception of an athlete. PLAY FOR FREE ON https://111144447777a.com

name: Love Is Dangerous
description: Love Is Dangerous is an action-adventure game featuring simple but flawless platform gameplay, amazing pixel art using modern techniques, engaging and powerful story, charismatic and funny characters, comic-book-style cinematics and lots of love.

name: Choice: Texas
description: Choice: Texas is an educational interactive fiction game addressing reproductive healthcare access in the state of Texas. Play as one of five Texas women attempting to navigate the state's reproductive healthcare system. Although billed as interactive fiction, Choice: Texas is based on extensive research into healthcare access, legal restrictions, geography, and demographics, and is reflective of the real circumstances facing women in the state.

name: Fallout: Miami
description: Fallout: Miami is an upcoming DLC-sized mod for Fallout 4 with an original setting, complete with its own engrossing main quest, interesting side quests and characters, including new companions. The central theme of our story is the struggle between order and freedom. The setting for this new adventure is the post-post-apocalyptic Vacation Wasteland of Miami Beach. Once a popular tourist destination, attracting rich and glamorous visitors both foreign and domestic, it now plays host to an eclectic assortment of factions and societies, each with its own culture and approach to the challenges of this new post-nuclear world. The once-great slaver kingdom of Sunshine Cove has recently come under threat by a horde of automobile-worshipping nomads calling themselves the Nuclear Patriots. While Miami's various factions vie for control over the Vacation Wasteland, a long-forgotten remnant of the old world slumbers beneath the waves, waiting for an opportunity to reclaim America once again.

name: Lo-Fi: Thexnerxxm
description: A story that takes place in a trauma treatment center in a different world from yours. The "work" is performed in the client's 'memory room', and the members are total of three people; you, the operator, and a field agent 'diver' who will install equipment and perform treatment directly in the memory room. Please carry out therapy work with the diver.

name: The Battle Never Ends
description: The Battle Never Ends is a horror-adventure RPG game that users able to investigate the surroundings and interact with the battle space.

name: Ultra Custom Night
description: Ultra Custom Night is a fan game of Ultimate Custom Night, but Ultra Custom Night has more Characters (500+), additional floors and systems.

name: SmallWorlds
description: SmallWorlds was an MMO game that runned in web browsers. You could build your own room, house, or even your own world, and fill it with a wide variety of items and fun activities.

name: The Hierophant
description: Take on the role of Hero in a humble land where evil has awoken in this simple hand-drawn, Turn-based RPG!

name: A Space Odyssey
description: This is a VR game, you can travel the solar system through your VR devices in this game, round trip the Sun,venus,mercury,earth,moon,mars,Saturn,Jupiter,Uranus,Feel the shock of the universeã€‚

name: Boss of the Mafia
description: Boss Of The Mafia is a side-scrolling game in which you play as the boss of the mafia! In this incredibly difficult platformer you have to get through all the obstacles and dangerous traps in order to complete this game to the end. Cool relaxing jazz music will help you with this!

name: Chronomaster
description: You are Korda, the Chronomaster. You must re-start time and right the wrongs of a war-plagued past in this epic quest for vengeance. Journey through man-made "pocket universes" full of cyborgs, pirates and witches who provide deadly puzzles. It's up to you to return justice to the stars.

name: Hidden Ghost Town 2
description: Find the objects that are hidden on the map.

name: Insipid
description: Insipid is a puzzle game for vigilance.

name: Thalassophobia
description: Thalassophobia - 2D game that combines survival and roguelike features. A desperate struggle for the survival of the crew and battles with gigantic creatures, inspired by the pantheon of Lovecraft's monsters awaits you.

name: Grow Flow
description: A first person parkour game with art inspired by european avant-gardes. Make your way through over sixty levels with plenty of different mechanics to explore!

name: Gloomy Juncture
description:
Gloomy Juncture is a neo-noir psychological thriller and a character-driven adventure with a core focus on point & click gameplay with challenging puzzles.

Set in the 90s, the story unfolds in a decaying and morally bankrupt urban setting. You're not special; you're not a hero. One night, a single gunshot shatters the silence, setting the wheels of fate in motion. You'll step into the shoes of a mundane janitor asked to complete a final task before clocking out, and it will turn into a pulp mystery as your fate collides with the aftermath of that pivotal gunshot.

Unravel your fate and cross the edge in this peculiar tale of obsession

name: Solbane
description: Battle against bosses in a top-down action shooter with minor RPG elements. Choose between three diverse classes, each with a unique arsenal of abilities.

name: Roadworks 2
description: City building real time strategy economy simulation game. Manage the resources on the map and build a city connected through road networks of different types of road so that you can meet production targets.

name: Wintertwined
description: When Winter and Giles find themselves stuck in a cabin during a snowstorm, they discover it's horrific history.

name: Rootlash
description: Rootlash takes you on an adventure where you get to play as a living tree! Your home is being threatened by the expansion of humans, wood loggers and miners are destroying your precious home. Take the right into your own hands and fight off the human invaders and reclaim your home forest!

name: The Plague Doctor of Wippra
description: The plague spreads fear and agony in the small town of Wippra. As a doctor, you help where you can. Then medieval superstition and religious zeal mix into a deadly threat.

name: Cryweard
description: "Project Ergath" is a single-player action RPG developed by a student, with the focus on tense moments in battles and a feeling of accomplishment in a victory.Enjoy the tense, authentic combat and the sense of accomplishment amplified by the high difficulty level.

name: Pure Logic
description: Explore logic symbols. Discover the rules. Solve complex puzzles. Conquer all zones. Feel the power of your logical side!

name: Brimstone Manor
description: Can you survive being a demonâ€™s nanny? Uncover a world of paranormal secrets. Magic. Miracles. And a battle between order and chaos. And for your heart.

name: Vanildo's Journey
description: Vanildo, a skilled retired adventurer is forced to return to work because of the peculiar events that are taking place in the city of Pirarotoba, including the disappearance of his old friend.

name: Casual Pro Wrestling
description: Casual Pro Wrestling is a professional wrestling game with an emphasis on fun. It blends intuitive controls inspired by genre classics with ragdoll physics for added fun and drama. It features couch and online multiplayer and offers a plethora of possibilities for customization.

name: Battlefleet Gust Wind
description: Aboutï¼šThe solar system was invaded by aliens of unknown origin. The earth has fallen. As the commander of the surviving space fleet, return to the solar system from outer space and save the earth.

name: Speed Creators
description: A high speed multiplayer platformer where each player builds a slice of a sprawling level filled with traps and special blocks to compete and race against each other in a variety of unique game modes.

name: Magic Disc Golf
description: Magic Disc Golf lets you take control of your disc and steer it towards the basket. Find the optimal route, navigate challenging terrain, and use your speed boost to cover some extra ground. Choose from three 18-hole courses and four game modes.

name: Asteroid Force
description: Asteroids are headed directly towards Earth. Destroy asteroids before they can slam into Earth. Earn medallions to purchase ship upgrades to help in the fight to save Earth.

name: Tri-Star
description: Tri-Star is an endless horizontal-scrolling space shooter featuring Roguelike and Roguelite elements. Blast through waves of enemies and battle against arduous bosses. Form a squadron of three unique ships from an expanding roster and equip them with upgrades as you engage in a battle for survival.

name: Anyway
description: Anyway is a 2D platformer adventure in which every day is not the same: There are some secret rules to this place which can change from day to day. So be cautious, it may be dangerous out there!

name: This House
description: A hand drawn, creepy puzzle, RPG adventure. Will you be able to escape this House?

name: Willage
description: An interactive series, where the player meets Eastern European culture.

name: Bio Bots
description: Bio Bots is a Free to play third-person team-based shooter. Enjoy playing chaotic matches in different game-modes

name: Generic RPG Idle
description: An idle RPG where your loot matters. Optimize your equipment, defeat mighty foes, perform dark rituals and enjoy a medieval tale of revenge in a twisted version of Brazil. Elite enemies challenge how optimized your build is while random-free combat ensures attacks never miss.

name: Tranquil Cove
description: Your mother recently passed away, and her mysterious childhood home in a small town called Tranquil Cove was passed down to you. In an attempt to learn about your mothers mysterious past, you go to investigate. Nothing could prepare you for what you find there...

name: Doomsday Paradise
description:
Welcome to Sunset Town: a tropical paradise to party your days away before the world devouring monster threatens to end everything. But not to worry- surely some brave hero will rise up to save the world!

Someone is going to save the world.... right?

Doomsday Paradise is a goofy, competitive multiplayer RPG where you put off saving the world to party instead.

name: Uncolored Bob II
description: "Uncolored Bob ii" is a roguelike platformer adventure with randomly generated levels. It has level editor, so you can share challenge with your friends.

name: Space Depression
description: You must do your best to protect the world! Destroy all enemies. Get the highest score.

name: Afterworld King
description: AfterWorld King - Top Down View - A logic game where the player beats off the skulls of punishment and burns the souls of sinners, each completed task brings one step closer to victory.

name: The Last Conquerors
description: Join up with Broaster in an epic journey were you will fight diverse enemies, get to know what happened with the war on Earth and finally, make decisions that could affect Earthâ€™s destiny.

name: The War Will Win
description: The War Will Win is a classic turn-based strategy game with the added uncertainty and luck of card games. Play the main story with branching storylines, complete side quests, and unlock unique cards with uniques abilities or battle a friend on local-multiplayer.

name: Path to Gaea
description: Path To Gaea is a turn based puzzle-adventure that follows a simple story between good and evil. However, not everything is what is seems.

name: One Day
description: Survive for One Day in a valley, where elementals want to kill you. Cast fireballs, avoid water and travel between islands to live as long as you can! Can you do it?

name: Babba Yagga: Woodboy
description: Baba Yaga is a horror game, where you play as a wooden boy who needs to bring sleeping herbs for his mum, but on the way, he meets the BABA YAGA! After that everything becomes more brutal and scary.

name: Oppcium
description: A sentient alien organism has escaped its cage and now freely roams a government facility. Silence has engulfed the city as a toxic and unidentified cloud was released from black oily stones. Witness and investigate a dire situation that appears to escalate by the hour.

name: Adamanta View
description: An action Surviving game with a mission!

name: Makai Kingdom: Reclaimed and Rebound
description: In Makai Kingdom: Reclaimed and Rebound, Lord Zetta, master of tactical warfare, aims to invade and reclaim the Netherworldâ€”as a book! Utilize clever strategies and powerful magic, along with deadly weapons ranging from broadswords to rocket launchers to take control of your enemiesâ€™ land.

name: This & Cats
description: Managing a small shop is cool, but it's even cooler when there are cats around! This & Cats is a relaxing first-person life sim in which you earn money by adopting cats and making customers happy.

name: Snow Scout
description: In this exploration adventure on skis, which is experienced in virtual reality, you start a one-week stint as a volunteer for the Snow Scouts. Fixing up a remote ski resort, all alone high in the mountains, nothing can go wrong - right?

name: Voxel Farm Island
description: You now have a dream island right away! Take care of the farm, develop business, Expand transportation, and there are more interesting things on the island, such as magical giving tree, fishery and the mine full of treasures... You have a most important task - to solve the mystery on the island!

name: Mars Tactics
description: Classic turn-based tactical combat with some modern twists. Use stress to manage RNG. Master advanced suppression mechanics. Grow troops who develop abilities, personalities & relationships based on what happens in battle. Procedural, destructible maps. Realistic bullet physics.

name: Lost Contact
description: LOST CONTACT is an exciting realistically designed space station shooter. As the main character of unflinching Nil Heard you will experience soul grabbing horrors of facing the mutant monsters of the Universe.

name: Camelot: Wrath of the Green Knight
description: Camelot: Home of King Arthurâ€™s courtâ€¦ and intrigue! When the Lady of the Lake goes missing, her husband the Green Knight blames King Arthur, threatening the peace of Camelot for allâ€¦

name: Power Pushout
description: Power Pushout is an epic turn-based asian-style strategy game with martial arts elements. Choose your warrior and master figures and fight with them in a wild battle to rule over the game board. Either you throw your opponent off the board or you conquer the opposing towers to win the game.

name: Arrows
description: Arrows is a puzzle game with a minimalist and modern visual that consists of aligning the colored blocks

name: May God Forgive Us
description: Stealthily navigate this tense survival horror by managing scarce resources, solving puzzles and when all else fails, fighting to escape the nightmare you've woken up too in the laboratory..

name: DreamScapes Dimensions
description: A free to play, first person medieval fantasy, MMORPG. Pre-Alpha | Solo Indie | Retro Look and Feel | Versatile Character Creation | Tutorial Quests | Harvesting and Crafting | Skills and Spells | Player Building | Procedurally Generated Random Adventures | Daily Gifts

name: Greed Is Bad
description: Greed Is Bad - A platformer where the player runs through unique and intricate caves, you must collect all the coins to go to the next level, since your greed will not let you leave the level leaving at least one coin to the evil dead.

name: A Gift of War
description: A Gift of War is a role playing game about a young man going on a mission to assist his country's war effort against the bordering enemy. It features simultaneous turn-based combat akin to a roguelike, but its levels are carefully crafted by hand.

name: Cursed Island
description: Search for secrets, solve puzzles, get ready to survive a series of dangerous nights in this action adventure full of challenges and difficulties. Will you be able to escape from the Cursed island?

name: Worlds Builder
description: WORLDS Builder is game about alchemy, controlling forces of nature, creating worlds, building, researching and trading! Create new lands, mountains and forests, build houses, farms and workshops, discover new technologies. Start with a small mining village and grow it into a rich city!

name: The Oathkeeper
description: Ira is a famed mercenary, called The Oathkeeper. When one of his contracts puts him in the middle of an ancient war of good v. evil and face to face with the woman he begins to fall in love with, he will have to start fighting for more than just money!

name: Let's Puzzle
description: Let's Puzzle is a collection of beautiful pictures from yourself and from others. You can sit at home, relax and solve fun puzzles. Get rid of the tiredness of the whole day and plunge into the wonderful puzzle world.

name: Delta Zero
description: A fast-paced action platformer with non-linear world progression and level design! Challenging gameplay with 3 difficulty modes, 2 playable characters and local co-op! Fight bosses in any order and experience the world change with each victory, enemies become harder, faster and smarter!

name: Hidden Beast
description: Hidden Beast is a strategy game, similar to chess and an old board game called Combat. The player moves his army towards static totems that, when confronted, turn into beasts. In the clash, the stronger piece defeats the weaker one and removes it from the scene.

name: Oasis: Dark Forest
description: Darkness rules the land. Defend your holy tree. Plant trees to defeat the ghost army. Explore and collect resources in a randomly generated forest world. Upgrade your technology tree. You are the light in the darkness.

name: The Atlas Mystery: A VR Puzzle Game
description: Explore the haunted halls of the infamous Atlas Theater, a 1940â€™s era movie palace that played host to a shocking Hollywood tragedy. Solve intricate puzzles, discover startling artifacts, and evade sinister forces to uncover the twisted truth behind the theaterâ€™s dark history.

name: The Midnight Wind
description: The Midnight Wind is a sarcastic single-player pixel art RPG following the story of four hosts of the souls of a dead star. The story loosely takes place in Indonesia, where players will embark on a bare-bones journey to protect themselves and their people.

name: Fatal Paws
description: A visual novel with dark humor, turn based combat, and stat building. Experience the fatal strength in companionship and the emotional bond that can come from it.

name: Team Ice Cream VR
description: Play alone in VRâ€”or get together with a friend on PC and work as a teamâ€”to attract and serve customers ice cream. Earn tips to buy upgrades and outfits and move up in the world!

name: Sketch Crawler
description: Sketch Crawler is a super-creative deck-building roguelike single player RPG game about the King of Cartoons who lost his kingdom in a wicked magic picture.

name: Super Gunfight
description: Super Gunfight Is A top-down Shooter. The goal of the game is to destroy all enemies on the map and complete the mission.This is a unique fusion of arcade, action and unmatched dynamics.

name: Loco Launcher
description: You're an animal with an appetite for destruction. Use a cannon, vehicle, ride in a giant rock, or simply run through walls to destroy buildings as fast as possible. Have fun in these wacky arcade levels with added abilities that make no sense whatsoever!

name: Forest Star
description: Help a monkey find a fallen star in this short adventure game! Meet and recruit other animals, find useful items, and discover new abilities. Multiple endings available depending on your choices!

name: Galactic Federation
description: Classical 3D space combat simulation with unique 100% dynamic destruction engine, allows you to realistically damage and burn through your enemies exactly where you hit them with blasters, causing their onboard systems and armor to melt away and fall apart. Made by solo developer.

name: Blow & Fly
description: Fulfill your wildest dreams: become a blowfish that traverses the world by rolling on the floor! Take a deep breath, aim at your target and blow all the water out of your puny body to propel yourself in the air!

name: Astral Space
description: Have you ever controlled a game without using a keyboard or a mouse? Yes, This is possible. We have developed a Artificial Intelligence-based game that gives you the ability to control the ball's movement and directions via hand movements, the challenge is to gain as many points as possible.

name: Pico Islands
description: Lead your settlers to build cities in a medieval island world.

name: Hyper Catch
description: Hyper Catch is a fast paced multiplayer catch game. You only win when you touch your opponent. You will receive weapons and other tools to improve your chances to win. This is not a typical shooter game! The worlds are completely destructible and the players are regenerated by nano-bots.

name: Mycosis
description: Mycosis is action-platformer situated in an underground laboratory complex. The gameplay includes fighting various enemies, mostly the fungus infected zombies, collecting different items and solving some simple puzzles. It was inspired by Abuse, Half-life and everyday laboratory work!

name: In Shape 2
description: In this minimalistic arcade game, you have to move and reshape your figure to match the passing figures.

name: Diefrosty
description: Diefrosty is an unsurvival puzzle game, where your one and only goal is to kill your ice-cuby character no matter how. Intereract with many obstacles, use really dumb ways to die while melting your brain to beat each level.

name: First Time in Paris
description: Join amateur travel blogger Kate Robinson and her daughter Nicole as they go on their first big business trip to save a Parisian hotel!

name: Time Idle RPG
description: Idle RPG game that uses real life Time as the core mechanic and currency. Featuring offline progress, prestige, unfolding mechanics, trees, and much more!

name: Far Lands
description: Far Lands is a sandbox oriented SURVIVAL game. Build and defend your base from creatures. Gather resources, craft better gear and discover new DIMENSIONS.

name: Galacticon
description: Galacticon is a video game with the look and feel of arcade cabinet games from the early 80's in the style of Williams classics: "Defender" or "Joust", with the gameplay of legendary "Jetpac", and with touches of "puzzle".

name: Blink Planets
description: Blink Planets is a strategy puzzle game where you pioneer a wasteland planet into a settleable home for people. The colorful "BASE" symbolizes the resource needed to develop a planet. Place "BLOCKS" to secure further land. Explore more planets to continue welcoming migrants.

name: Ynxa
description:
Help Leaf on his adventure.
Unlock the powers of Air, Fire and Water to escape the perils of the Temple.

Cross and pass the 8 paths of Perseverance to prove your bravery.

Find your way under the gardens and escape from the great pyramid.

name: Rakuten
description: Rakuten is a physics based space shooter where you pilot your own rocketship, shoot down enemy spacecraft, and unlock upgrades to further increase your capabilities and available weaponry.

name: The Jewel of Monostructure
description: Sanator: The Jewel of Monostructure is a dark fantasy visual novel that combines deep lore with exciting adventures. Who is behind the mysterious thefts and why are the gates of the Monostructure open again? Take control of Richard Murdock, the plague doctor, and find the answer.

name: The Tombs of Ultra 5
description: A Topdown Rouge like shooter. Defeat enemies and collect randomized buffs to help you survive and find the keys needed to progress.

name: Underwater Rescue
description: UnderWater Rescue - A platformer with physical controls for a three-limbed robot that clings to ledges and makes its way through the underwater world, avoiding collisions with missiles and collecting divers on board.

name: Cubstacle
description: Cubstacle is a casual puzzle and maze game. Within it your objective is to free cubes trapped in dangerous and confusing rooms, the movement of the cubes is limited and cannot be canceled stopping only when encountering an obstacle or death.

name: Dashwalk Dueling
description: Dashwalk Dueling is a minimalist 2D platform fighter. Its simple mechanics and visuals are the foundation for complex ground movement, creative combo routes, and fast-flowing combat! Choose from eight supers and reversals to dismantle the competition.

name: Pandanda
description: Pandanda was a massive multiplayer online game about red pandas. With your red panda, you could play games, chat with friends, adopt your own dragons, level up and other cool stuff.

name: Project Snaqe
description:
Project Snaqe is an action and precision game inspired by the classic Snake. Your main goal is to collect the minerals scattered through the map, adding cars to your convoy and increasing your high score.

The game has 3 different modes with progressive difficulty levels, in addition to the Classic Mode that remounts the traditional Snake gameplay. It also features a variety of obstacles, two navigation modes (drill and shooter), a nostalgic and quite charming pixel art look, great chip-tuney soundtracks and a global ranking system supported by Steam.

name: Small Life
description: An interactive city discovery game inspired by Shenzhen, China. Explore this one of a kind city and unravel the playful puzzles that will require a few twists of imagination.

name: Tiger Soldier I: MP077
description: Tiger Soldier is a military-themed run & gun shooter game. Playing as a lone soldier, first by fighting off infantry units and battling tanks then lob a hand grenade into the enemy's fort. Destroy the enemy's fort to clear game. The DLC include mission pack 077.
